attributes.action: fund a '101' phone service to cover the whole of Leicestershire, Leicester and Rutland to respond to anti-social behaviour and non-emergency calls.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call on the County, City and District Councils in our area to work together with the police and others to implement the service, if necessary with local funding.  We also request that they work in partnership to develop strategies and to implement action to eliminate anti-social behaviour from our streets.
